content.title: Supporting a Fellow Creator: Drinks & Dragons Coasters, by Stratation Design!
content.creator:
Printed Dimensions
February 5, 2025
content.content:
Hi everyone!
I wanted to take a moment to share a project from a fellow creator, Stratation Design.
Yann has launched Drinks & Dragons Coasters, a Kickstarter featuring 3D-printable coasters and a dice tower, perfect for tabletop gamers who love to add a bit of flair to their game nights.
The designs are both functional and stylish, making them a great addition to any RPG session. If youâ€™re into gaming accessories or looking for unique STL files to print, this is definitely worth checking out.
ðŸ”— Drinks & Dragons Coasters - Kickstarter
(Here is my Custom Referral Tag link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/stratationdesign3d/drinks-and-dragons-3d-printable-stl-coasters-and-dice-tower?ref=9oebj5 )
As an independent creator myself, I know how important it is to support creative projects, so if you like what Yann is doing, consider backing or sharing it with fellow 3D printing and tabletop gaming enthusiasts!
Happy printing!
Printed Dimensions
